sentences.en: A null - balance system is provided by balancing the magnetic forces by electrostatic forces.
sentences.cn: 零位平衡系统是靠静电力来平衡磁力而造成的.

sentences.en: A spokeswoman said the agreement had been declared null and void.
sentences.cn: 女发言人称该协议已宣布无效。

sentences.en: The agreement will be considered null and void.
The contract was declared null and void.
The court ruled that the claim was null and void.
sentences.cn: 法庭裁决此项要求无效.

sentences.en: The device provides extreme sensitivity through a small range around the null point.
sentences.cn: 此装置在零点附近很小一段范围内具有极高的灵敏度.

sentences.en: The null result of the Michelson - Morley experiment suggests that the effects of the ether are undetectable.
sentences.cn: 迈克耳 孙- 莫雷实验的否定结果使人想到,以太的效应是不能检查到的.

sentences.en: The null result was directly related to a central postulate of the theory.
sentences.cn: 零结果都直接与理论的中心假设相联系.

sentences.en: The null subset corresponds to the term 1.
The operator O is the null operator.
The term null hypothesis arose from earlier agricultural and medical applic ation of statistics.
sentences.cn: 无效假设这个概念产生于早期的统计学在农业和医学方面的应用中.

sentences.en: This check is null and void.
This contract is null and void.
This null - balance system is usually more accurate than the direct - readout bridge.
sentences.cn: 这种调零系统通常比直读电桥更精确.

sentences.en: When the galvanometer reads zero the circuit is in the null - balance position.
sentences.cn: 当检流计的读数为零时,电路处于零平衡位置.

sentences.en: Whenever we reject the null hypothesis, the conclusion we do accept is called the alternative hypothesis.
sentences.cn: 无论何时,拒绝无效假设时, 我们所接受的结论叫做备择假设.

words.tran_cn: 无效；废弃；取消；（美）州对联邦法令的拒绝执行或承认
废弃者；使无效者；取消者
无效；无价值的事物或人；[数] 零度；退化阶数

phrases.tran_cn: 零假设；虚假设；解消假设

trans.tran_cn: <术>零值的，等于零的，（协议） 无法律效力，失效的
trans.tran_en: an agreement, contract etc that is null and void has no legal force
